name: Shield of the Dawnflower
text: You create a disk of sunlight on one arm. Any creature that strikes you with a melee attack deals normal damage, but also takes 1d6 points of fire damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +15). Creatures with reach weapons are not subject to this damage if they attack you. The shield provides illumination as if it were a continual flame spell. You can only have one instance of this spell in effect at a time. It does not stack with similar damaging aura spells such as fire shield.
mythicText:
The disk of sunlight protects you as a buckler with a +1 enhancement bonus per 4 caster levels (maximum +5).

You can make a melee touch attack with your shield of the Dawnflower in place of a normal attack to deal its fire damage to a creature. Creatures taking damage from your shield catch on fire (Reflex negates); the save DC to extinguish the fire is equal to the DC of the spell.
text_zh: 你在一件武装上创造一轮日光。任何用近战攻击你的生物造成正常的伤害，但也会承受1d6点+1点/施法者等级的火焰伤害。拥有长触击武器的生物，在攻击你时不会承受此伤害。此法术就好像不灭明焰(continual flame)那样发光。同一时间本法术只有一个会在你身上生效。本法术也不会跟像是火焰护盾(fire shield)等类似的灵光法术叠加伤害。
